job_responsibilities.title: LLM Agent
job_responsibilities.content: Developing a chatbot that can be used by customers to get information on products and their applications. Also recommends products from the website and displays source of information as a PDF.

job_responsibilities.title: Full-Stack Website Development
job_responsibilities.content: Developing multiple plugins that help automating order processing, shipping and delivery. Also responsible for maintaining the website and adding new features.

job_responsibilities.title: Container-Based Packing System
job_responsibilities.content:
Built a microservice to replace the eCommerce cart with shipping container-based order creation. Uses a drag-and-drop UI for enhanced customizability, transparency, and efficiency.
Tech stack: ExpressJS, ReactJS, CloudSQL, hosted on GCP with Cloud Run, Storage Buckets, and Load Balancers

job_responsibilities.title: Full-Stack Website Development
job_responsibilities.content: Developed and customised CsCart-based doocan.io website

job_responsibilities.title: AI Furniture Image Generation Tool
job_responsibilities.content: Developed an AI tool for generating furniture images from user prompts, by fine tuning an image generation model and Python Flask API.

job_responsibilities.title: Python Developer - McKinsey & Company
job_responsibilities.content: Developed REST APIs and products for ETL, supply chain and logistics. Used Python framework and libraries like FastAPI, Pandas & Numpy, as well as PostgreSQL and Docker.

job_responsibilities.title: NodeJS Developer - Inhouse Project
job_responsibilities.content: Developed multiple dashboards supported by NodeJS backend and ejs templating language to fetch user inputs and create configurations. We used inversify methodologies to create these REST APIs and pluggable services.

work.info_text: I was outsourced as a Python Developer in a client company, where we Developed REST APIs and products for ETL, supply chain and logistics. I used Python framework and libraries like FastAPI, Pandas & Numpy, as well as PostgreSQL and Docker. For another inhouse project we developed multiple dashboards supported by NodeJS backend and ejs templating language to fetch user inputs and create configurations. We used inversify methodologies to create these REST APIs and pluggable services.

As a Frontend ReactJS developer, I worked on creating an MVP of a full-fledged inventory management UI. Used React Router, Context API, HighCharts, created resusable components and handled complex state management for the same.

Worked as a full stack web developer to revamp company's website which was outdated in multiple areas. We created a new website using Django and modern frontend libraries like Bootstrap (css) and Jquery (js). I was also responsible to deploy the website on Heroku cloud.

projects.title: Alumni System API
projects.content: API to facilitate sharing of alumni documents like certificate and transcripts. Implemented token based authentication and authorization using FastAPI, dynamodb database, s3 file storage and retrival and also configurable with docker.

projects.title: Realtime Emergency Reporting System
projects.content: Built a system that can be used by civilians to report crime or seek help during emergencies from concerne authorities and the authorities to track these requests. Contained NodeJS based API, MongoDB, ReactJS and Android Mobile Application.

projects.title: Public Queue Optimization System
projects.content: Built a system to predict wait time for patients in multiple queues in a hospital. Implemented a responsive frontend module and Django backend module running on algorithms created in python to calculate wait times.

Leadership: Trainee Mentor at Anantha Insights, conducted multiple workshops as part of intern training program.
Web Master at ACM SAKEC. Lead the website team to revamp a static website into dynamic by adding database and dashboards.
Communication: Speaker at a 2 day Django + Python Workshop. Discussed basic concepts of Python as well as Web Development including MVC pattern web apps, APIs, HTTP protocal and much more.
